original_text: And he shall bathe his body in water in a holy place and put on his garments and come out and offer his burnt offering and the burnt offering of the people and make atonement for himself and for the people.
korean_text: 거룩한 곳에서 물로 그의 몸을 씻고 자기 옷을 입고 나와서 자기의 번제와 백성의 번제를 드려 자기와 백성을 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: And he shall bathe his body in water in a holy place
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거룩한 곳에서 물로 그의 몸을 씻고

sentences.original_text: and offer his burnt offering and the burnt offering of the people
and make atonement for himself and for the people.
